<<<<<<< HEAD
A sermon preached at Barstaple vpon occasion of the late happy success of Gods Church in forraine parts. By G.H. D.D. Hakewill, George, 1578-1649.
[2], 36 p.
Printed [by R. Badger] for R. Allot, and are to be sold at the signe of the Beare in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1632.
G.H. = George Hakewill. Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
=======
